remarks: A transposition of elements of a set without a special element corresponds to a transposition of elements of the set.  (Contributed by AV, 15-Jan-2019.)
statement:
pmtrdifel.t $e |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` ( N \ { K } ) ) $.
pmtrdifel.r $e |- R = ran ( pmTrsp ` N ) $.
pmtrdifel $p |- A. t e. T E. r e. R A. x e. ( N \ { K } ) ( t ` x ) = ( r ` x ) $.
$d K r $.
$d N r x $.
$d R r $.
$d T x $.
$d r t x $.
